summary: Four college friends starts an underground fight club in order to earn quick money, nevertheless they become suspects of a murder of a man, who turns out to be the mob boss' brother.
cast: Sunil Shetty|Sohail Khan|Zayed Khan|Dino Morea|Riteish Deshmukh|Ashmit Patel|Rahul Dev|Yash Tonk|Dia Mirza|Amrita Arora|Neha Dhupia|Aseem Agarwal|Vikrant Anand|Dolly Bindra|Aashish Chaudhary|Kamal Chopra|Adi Irani|Ahmed Khan|Mumait Khan|Shehzad Khan|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Viivek Mashru|Rachana Maurya|Shree Rammy Pandey|Gargi Patel|Murli Sharma|Sujata Thakar|Puneet Vashisht|Omar Hosein
director: Directors: Abhay Chopra, Vikram Chopra (as Vicky Chopra)
title: Fight Club: Members Only
